Package org.javassonne.model

Interface Summary
TileBoard  
TileBoardIterator  
 

Class Summary
IntPair  
Tile The Tile class is used to represent a single tile in the game.
TileBoardDrawIterator  
TileBoardGenIterator  
TileDeck The Tile Deck class represents a collection of tiles used during gameplay.
TileFeature The TileFeature class is used to represent foreground items in the game.
TileMapBoard  
TileSerializer The TileSerializer is a general purpose class for reading and writing TileSets to disk.
TileSet The tile set class represents a collection of tiles, and stores the number of times each one may be drawn during the game.
 

Enum Summary
Tile.Quadrant The Quadrant enum allows quadrants of the Tile to be addressed more easily.
Tile.Region The Region enum allows regions of the Tile to be addressed more easily.
 

Exception Summary
BoardPositionFilledException
